name: Bunicorn Token
description: Bunicorn is a BSC-powered DEX that combines: Flexible Pools with a customizable number of tokens, weight, fee; and Stable Pools with super low slippage, high capital efficiency for swapping stablecoins. The flexibilities of Bunicorn protocol mitigates the risk of impermanent loss compared to traditional 50:50 pairs while powering more advanced features such as Liquidity Bootstrapping Pool, Smart Order Routing on BSC. Additionally, Bunicorn introduces an innovative Yield Farming model with vesting rewards wrapped in NFT collectibles.
